description: Garden was greated over two years by neighbors hauling out the debris from three demolished homes, finding clean fill, and initally making our own raised beds for the communal garden. After two years we began working with Green Thumb who assisted our ongoing work with supplies and materials and assisted us in transferring the lot to the Parks Dept. Newly installed water tank thanks to GrowNYC! The garden is a friendly place to hang out, and is split between communal garden and 16 raised beds for growing vegetables or flowers.
name: Amazing Garden
